Magmeld Emissary Leader Lada: Magmeld want to visit, a place where the cats lived in good neighborhood with the Elves? elves met the cats, having been in one of his many research expeditions. Cats have been a peaceful race, have a greater ability to magic and rich culture. They built a magmelde village in which they live to this day. What do you say? Want to see them?
